About.Hours & facilities: Guided tours of collections. Digital prints of items in the photographic library are available for purchase.

About.Access: The book and photographic libraries and main office are now open to the public. The shop & guided tours open most days 10am to 4pm or by appointment after hours.

About.Acquisition focus: Naval history, particularly with regard to the twentieth century

About.Major holdings:
• Photographic library of over 80, 000 photographic items
• Naval, Marine and Space artifacts including signed personal accounts photographs, ship crests, uniforms etc.

Contact.Note: This repository was formerly located in Sydney, New South Wales.
